translations: v．闲逛，漫步：以轻松、悠闲的步伐行走。

sentences.sentence: He sauntered by, looking as if he had all the time in the world.
sentences.translation: 他悠闲地走过，仿佛时间对他来说是无穷无尽的。

sentences.sentence: He whistled as he sauntered along the street.
sentences.translation: 他吹着口哨，悠然地沿着街道漫步。

sentences.sentence: She then went out to see a neighbour, and I sauntered towards the back parlour.
sentences.translation: 说罢，她便出门探望邻居，我则向后客厅逛去。
